__e: Winston and I don't need you, sister.

Sorry, Miss. But Dr. Winston doesn't do that sort of work anymore.
Anyway, when Winston called, he was a mess.
Because Tom Winston has gone and figured it out for me.
And I saw with my own eyes one day when Winston saved those kids from a burning building, including a little boy.
If you leave, then I'm with Winston, and I can't handle that.
Miss Winston is my mother, and I don't wanna think about her right now.
Mr Winston, sure that's the guy who carjacked you?
